remarks: The scalar field of a complex pre-Hilbert space is closed under square roots of all numbers except possibly the negative reals.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 8-Oct-2015.)
statement:
cphsca.f $e |- F = ( Scalar ` W ) $.
cphsca.k $e |- K = ( Base ` F ) $.
cphsqrtcl2 $p |- ( ( W e. CPreHil /\ A e. K /\ -. -u A e. RR+ ) -> ( sqrt ` A ) e. K ) $.
